introductionQuestion: Are you looking to craft a standout mobile app that not only enhances the efficiency of your business but also captivates your customers?
introducion: I specialise in developing cutting-edge mobile applications, delivering top-notch solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations, driving tangible business success.

services.description: Building apps for iOS, MacOS and watchOS

testimonials.name: Kerri M. - My Better Breathing Ltd
testimonials.comment: We have been fortunate enough to be able to engage Jamie to develop software for a mobile app  which supports a hardware product. Jamie has been efficient in scoping the project, defining the variables to achieve optimum functionality, sizing and estimating time required and knowledgeable in guiding some of the decisions needing to be made around scope and function of the project. It has been a very smooth, professional process with Jamie. He has been very easy to deal with. I would highly recommend Jamie and we will be using his services and skills again. Thanks Jamie!

testimonials.name: Theuno D.
testimonials.comment: Jamie was an absolute pleasure to work with. I can definitely recommend him. I will most definitely be using him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Justin R. - Project Manager
testimonials.comment: If you're looking for a mobile app developer, I highly recommend Jamie. He's a true professional who always meets delivery schedules and works well with other team members to develop requirements and user stories. What's more, Jamie provides accurate estimates, often delivering ahead of schedule, and his work is always of high quality. Communication is key in any project, and Jamie is an excellent communicator. He's very easy to work with and can take the lead when needed. He's capable of managing internal peers and external contractual development resources, making him a valuable asset to any project.

portfolioItems.name: JOBY One
portfolioItems.previewDescription: Capture beautiful photos, amazing videos, and breathtaking time lapses with the power of JOBY’s motion control, microphone, and light devices. I was responsible for building this app on iOS, and later Flutter, as an employee for Syrp Lab.
portfolioItems.technologiesUsed: iOS, Swift, Combine, UIKit, Bluetooth LE, Objective-C(++), C++, MVVM, Swinject, Flutter, BLoC, get_it, camera, Firebase, Firebase Analytics

infoPages.description:
I was responsible for building the JOBY One app during my time as an employee at Syrp Lab. This app is Copyright © Videndum Media Solutions. Integrating with various JOBY motion control, microphone, and light devices over Bluetooth LE, users can enhance their smartphone videography to produce breathtaking content.

Collaborating with designers and stakeholders, I developed this app for native iOS using Swift. Following the release of the iOS app, I was then tasked with rebuildinng the app using Flutter, to provide support on both iOS and Android.

Users can capture stunning moving videos and awe-inspiring moving timelapses using their JOBY motion control devices. The app provides a seamless experience for users to also further enhance their scene with their JOBY light and microphone devices.

The app integrates with the JOBY Spin and Swing motion control devices to move the user's mobile phone during a capture. It provides advanced control functionality for the JOBY Wavo PRO Bluetooth microphone, to allow users to capture crisp audio. Finally, the JOBY Beamo light devices can be controlled with the app to spectacularly illuminate the user's scene.

portfolioItems.name: JOBY Motion
portfolioItems.previewDescription: A predecessor of the JOBY One app. This app integrates seamlessly with the JOBY Spin and Swing motion control devices to allow users to capture awesome motion videos, time lapses, and panoramic images.
portfolioItems.technologiesUsed: iOS, Swift, Combine, UIKit, Bluetooth LE, Objective-C(++), C++, MVVM, Swinject, Firebase, Firebase Analytics

infoPages.description:
I was responsible for building the JOBY Motion app during my time as an employee at Syrp Lab. This app is Copyright © Videndum Media Solutions. Integrating with the JOBY Spin and Swing motion control devices over Bluetooth LE, users can capture amazing motion videos and timelapses.

Collaborating with designers and stakeholders, I developed this app for native iOS using Swift. This app was eventually superseded by the JOBY One app, which integrates with even more JOBY devices.

The JOBY Spin is a device that rotates the user's phone. Depending on the orientation of the Spin, the phone can be made to rotate either horizontally or vertically. Users can also combine two of the devices using a pan-tilt bracket, to rotate the phone along both the horizontal and vertical axes.
The JOBY Swing is a device that moves the user's phone linearly. Users can make their videos move left-to-right, right-to-left, in and out, or any which way they may desire.

portfolioItems.name: Syrp Genie App
portfolioItems.previewDescription: The Syrp Genie app allows filmmakers to capture stunning motion time lapses and videos. I was responsible for maintaining and improving this app on iOS as an employee for Syrp Lab.
portfolioItems.technologiesUsed: iOS, Swift, Combine, UIKit, Bluetooth LE, Objective-C(++), C++, MVVM, Swinject, Firebase, Firebase Analytics

infoPages.description: Syrp Lab make a range of advanced motion control devices that move a camera as it is filming a video or time lapse. The Syrp Genie app enables users to control these devices to capture any sort of shot they can imagine.

I maintained and improved this app by adding new features, fixing bugs, and improving the app's performance. I raised the app's crash-free use rate from 70% to 93%, and its unit test coverage from 0% to 60%.

Using Syrp's wide range of motion control devices, users can capture content that moves in all sorts of ways. They can move their camera linearly, rotate it, or even move it in a complex path. The app also allows users to control the camera's focus and exposure settings.

portfolioItems.name: Manfrotto Motion
portfolioItems.previewDescription: During my time working at Syrp Lab, I was responsible for fully rebranding the Syrp Genie App to become the Manfrotto Motion app. This involved a complete overhaul of the app's UI and UX to align with the Manfrotto brand identity.
portfolioItems.technologiesUsed: iOS, Swift, Combine, UIKit, Bluetooth LE, Objective-C(++), C++, MVVM, Swinject, Firebase, Firebase Analytics

infoPages.description: Like the Syrp Genie app, the Manfrotto Motion offers filmmakers a variety of capture modes to create content in different ways. This picture demonstrates how the main screen of the app was rebranded to align with the Manfrotto brand identity.

The keyframe screen allows the users to record a video or timelapse that moves across any sort of path they desire. This picture demonstrates how this screen was rebranded to align with the Manfrotto brand identity.

The simple setup screen allows the users to record a video that rotates between a start and end angle. This picture demonstrates how this screen was rebranded to align with the Manfrotto brand identity.

portfolioItems.name: MyFlatmate
portfolioItems.previewDescription: Ever lived in a shared flat? Did you find it frustrating trying to figure out who owes whom money, or who’s turn it is to clean the floor? Enter, MyFlatmate, an app I developed on iOS as my first fully fledged personal project in my early days.
portfolioItems.technologiesUsed: iOS, Swift, Combine, UIKit, MVVM, Swinject, Firebase, Firestore, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, Push Notifications

infoPages.description: MyFlatmate streamlines the process for people living in shared flats to organise their house sharing admin. Users can create a flat group in the app, invite their flatmates, and then organise their shared chores, payments, and shopping lists.
I developed the app for native iOS using Swift, integrating with Google Firebase as the backend to manage the authentication, database, and push notifications.

contactPrompt: Ready to bring your mobile app needs to life? Get in contact below to get the ball rolling. I look forward to delivering a solution for you.
